summary: An ordinance providing for the laying off, opening, widening, extending and establishing of Columbia Street, over and across Lot 4, Block 193, Seattle Tide Lands; providing for the condemnation, appropriation, taking and damaging of land and other property necessary for the construction of an access ramp in Columbia Street and Columbia Street as widened herein, connecting the existing overhead structure in Alaskan Way with 1st Ave.; providing for the establishment of center line grades on said ramp; and providing for payment therefor.
